video.title: Revenge
video.synopsis: A young woman moves to the Hamptons and charms the pants off her new neighbors -- while plotting their downfall for sins committed against her family.

episodes.synopsis: Emily Thorne rents the Southampton home she once shared with her father and sets her plan in motion.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Emily gets to work on her next target, a former family friend who testified against her father; Victoria tries to find more information on Emily.
episodes.title: Trust

episodes.synopsis: Emily seeks to destroy the district attorney who convicted her father; grieving Victoria tries to confirm her suspicions about Emily's past.
episodes.title: Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: Emily targets the psychiatrist responsible for institutionalizing her as a child; Declan and Jack face a tough decision.
episodes.title: Duplicity

episodes.synopsis: Victoria's vulnerabilities are exposed when feelings of guilt and a fight with her daughter becomes too much to bear; a vindictive Lydia returns.
episodes.title: Guilt

episodes.synopsis: When an incriminating surveillance video surfaces, the Graysons begin to distrust security; the tension between Emily and Tyler comes to a head.
episodes.title: Intrigue

episodes.synopsis: A high-profile newspaper story interrupts the Graysons' wishes to lay low on their 25th anniversary; Frank hopes to prove his loyalty to Victoria.
episodes.title: Charade

episodes.synopsis: Emily's plot continues to unravel; tensions escalate in Victoria's relationship with her family; Lydia's memory raises concerns with the Graysons.
episodes.title: Treachery

episodes.synopsis: Realizing she has lost a valuable ally, Emily reaches out to her mentor; Victoria finds herself all alone; Tyler's influence continues to be a threat.
episodes.title: Suspicion

episodes.synopsis: After discovering a secret, Emily questions Nolan's loyalty; Victoria regains some power and things between her and Conrad take a turn for the worse.
episodes.title: Loyalty

episodes.synopsis: An unstable visitor crashes Daniel's intimate birthday celebration; Conrad and Victoria use Charlotte as a pawn in their bitter divorce battle.
episodes.title: Duress

episodes.synopsis: Emily targets an author with ties to the Graysons and the Clarkes; Conrad shows how dirty he is willing to get in the divorce.
episodes.title: Infamy

episodes.synopsis: Daniel's romantic proposal comes with dire ramifications; Charlotte moves back in with her mother; Jack's life is in jeopardy when he's betrayed.
episodes.title: Commitment

episodes.synopsis: In the excitement over Emily and Daniel's engagement party, things start to unravel for everyone; Victoria uses Conrad's father against him.
episodes.title: Perception

episodes.synopsis: Emily's vendetta takes a dark turn at her and Daniel's engagement party, putting everyone in mortal danger; Jack decides to track down Amanda.
episodes.title: Chaos

episodes.synopsis: The Graysons unite in the face of recent scandal; Emily becomes increasingly anxious; Amanda's location is questioned.
episodes.title: Scandal

episodes.synopsis: Daniel's imprisonment has an unexpected impact on Victoria; Jack's search for Amanda becomes more desperate.
episodes.title: Doubt

episodes.synopsis: When Emily finds out who was responsible for her father's murder, Victoria's pawns become entangled in an insidious cover-up.
episodes.title: Justice

episodes.synopsis: The press becomes increasingly hostile as Daniel's release nears; Emily discovers a photograph that leads to more clues about her father's death.
episodes.title: Absolution

episodes.synopsis: Amanda Clarke reads her father's journals and begins staking out the Graysons' home; as her anger and determination grow, she plans to seek justice.
episodes.title: Legacy

episodes.synopsis: A devastating loss brings Jack and Emily closer together; Victoria's new alliance could seal Conrad's fate; Charlotte goes after Declan.
episodes.title: Grief

episodes.synopsis: Emily intends to finally follow through with her plan for revenge; the Graysons continue down a path of self-destruction.
episodes.title: Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: With the ante even higher after last summer's events in the Hamptons, Emily must plan her next move.
episodes.title: Destiny

episodes.synopsis: Emily delicately continues to weave her way back into the Graysons' lives while keeping her ties to Amanda and her unborn child.
episodes.title: Resurrection

episodes.synopsis: The Graysons return to the spotlight and the center of a media storm; Emily's past continues to haunt her.
episodes.title: Confidence

episodes.synopsis: Amanda learns that playing with the Graysons is dangerous; Emily and Aiden are each caught off-guard; Daniel takes matters into his own hands.
episodes.title: Intuition

episodes.synopsis: Faces from the past show up in the Hamptons, bringing with them all sorts of trouble; Padma makes a move that could affect Nolcorp.
episodes.title: Forgiveness

episodes.synopsis: Victoria and Conrad reaffirm their loyalty to each other; Emily and Amanda fight to keep their pasts secret as Mason Treadwell digs for information.
episodes.title: Illusion

episodes.synopsis: Mason Treadwell examines Emily's past; Kara's worsening state draws the attention of the Graysons.
episodes.title: Penance

episodes.synopsis: In the year 2006, Victoria is visited by her estranged mother; Emily goes on her first mission under Takeda's training; Carl crosses the wrong people.
episodes.title: Lineage

episodes.synopsis: Nolan deals with a skeleton from his past; Daniel's role is challenged; Carl's christening reveals new concerns for Jack and Declan.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: Victoria starts to plan a scheme that includes Emily; Emily locks in on a new target; Declan learns something that may threaten the Stowaway's future.
episodes.title: Power

episodes.synopsis: Emily and Aiden execute their next attack at a fundraiser; Victoria plans her next move; and Jack, Declan and Amanda worry about the future.
episodes.title: Sabotage

episodes.synopsis: Emily stands by Daniel as he faces his fiercest business rival; Aiden takes a dark turn; Conrad Grayson winds up in control of Amanda's future.
episodes.title: Collusion

episodes.synopsis: Amanda and Jack's wedding stirs up emotions as Emily thinks about what might have been; Daniel faces complications at Grayson Global.
episodes.title: Union

episodes.synopsis: The Graysons put on a bold showing at their annual Labor Day party; the seas prove to be deadly as Amanda and Jack sail off to their honeymoon.
episodes.title: Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: Following the devastation on The Amanda, Emily's commitment to seeking vengeance is renewed; everyone in the Hamptons mourns a loss.
episodes.title: Retribution

episodes.synopsis: Jack is suspicious when Conrad and Victoria start a charity in Amanda Clarke's name; once again, Emily's past catches up with her.
episodes.title: Illumination

episodes.synopsis: As Victoria asks Amanda's foster brother for help with the foundation, Emily seizes an opportunity to settle a score with someone from her past.
episodes.title: Victory

episodes.synopsis: Emily brings Victoria's skeletons out of the closet during the Graysons' masquerade ball; Jack finds a surprising ally to help with his revenge plan.
episodes.title: Masquerade

episodes.synopsis: Emily, Aiden and Nolan try to uncover Fa1c0n's identity and stop the Initiative; Emily struggles with her future; Victoria has a revealing interview.
episodes.title: Identity

episodes.synopsis: Aiden struggles with Emily and Daniel's engagement; Jack makes a discovery; Victoria's big reveal has an effect on Conrad's campaign.
episodes.title: Engagement

episodes.synopsis: A heartbreaking death forces Emily to evaluate her quest for revenge.
episodes.title: Truth: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: A catastrophic moment changes everyone's lives.
episodes.title: Truth: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: Emily renews her plans for revenge as the Hamptons summer season kicks off, but complications arise with the return of Victoria's estranged son.
episodes.title: Fear

episodes.synopsis: Emily's revenge plans take an unexpected twist when she targets a former Grayson Global executive who is now a clergyman.
episodes.title: Sin

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected guest at Nolan's swank Hamptons housewarming party rocks the community while Conrad questions his sins.
episodes.title: Confession

episodes.synopsis: Emily must rely on help from a surprising source when her biggest victory yet goes awry, while Victoria strives to ensure her independence.
episodes.title: Mercy

episodes.synopsis: When Daniel makes a stunning statement at the Voulez magazine launch party, Emily fears she may be losing control of her plan -- and her groom.
episodes.title: Control

episodes.synopsis: Roadblocks mount against Emily as Daniel's attention moves elsewhere, Grayson Manor is in jeopardy and two important people turn on her.
episodes.title: Dissolution

episodes.synopsis: Conrad hires a party girl turned PR agent to restore the Grayson name, while Emily digs deeper into her plan and Nolan makes his own revenge scheme.
episodes.title: Resurgence

episodes.synopsis: Victoria throws Emily an unforgettable bridal shower, but when Daniel becomes more distant, Emily must take desperate measures.
episodes.title: Secrecy

episodes.synopsis: The ultimate wedding quickly nears and Emily prepares her final takedown, but the more she squeezes them, the more the Graysons slip away.
episodes.title: Surrender

episodes.synopsis: With the arrival of the wedding of the century, Emily is poised to complete her master plan, until enemies unite and bring dire consequences.
episodes.title: Exodus

episodes.synopsis: The Graysons close ranks as allies and enemies alike try to piece together the tragic events on the night of Emily's wedding, but the pressure mounts.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Emily struggles physically and mentally as her enemies close in, but a game-changing revelation sparks new destruction.
episodes.title: Endurance

episodes.synopsis: Even as Emily insists she is not giving up, with tension high between her and Daniel, her own instability might put all she's worked for at risk.
episodes.title: Hatred

episodes.synopsis: Emily's mysterious blackouts put everything and everyone she cares about at risk, while Victoria faces two powerful ghosts from her past.
episodes.title: Payback

episodes.synopsis: When Emily's blackouts turn even more violent, her sole hope rests with the person she betrayed most, while Victoria confronts someone from her past.
episodes.title: Struggle

episodes.synopsis: As the notorious Pascal LeMarchal's unexpected visit reverberates throughout the Hamptons, Emily and Victoria go head-to-head in a public showdown.
episodes.title: Disgrace

episodes.synopsis: Emily uses her newly single status to unravel a mystery from the past as Pascal attempts to make up for lost time with Victoria.
episodes.title: Addiction

episodes.synopsis: Victoria visits Mason Treadwell in jail to get his help in exposing Emily, while Emily and Aiden visit Aiden's mom to uncover buried family secrets.
episodes.title: Blood

episodes.synopsis: As Emily learns the identity of a key conspirator against her father, Victoria sets a trap she knows Emily can't resist.
episodes.title: Allegiance

episodes.synopsis: Emily invents a new identity to help turn the tide against the Graysons. Meanwhile, Charlotte goes to Jack for help.
episodes.title: Revolution

episodes.synopsis: Emily and Aiden use Charlotte as leverage to force a confession from Conrad and Victoria.
episodes.title: Impetus

episodes.synopsis: As Victoria closes in on the truth, Emily gets closer to avenging her father. Meanwhile, Daniel is framed for the death of a young girl.
episodes.title: Execution

episodes.synopsis: Emily declares that her scheme for revenge is over, but Nolan has his doubts. Meanwhile, Victoria plots her own vengeance, but David steps in.
episodes.title: Renaissance

episodes.synopsis: Emily reveals her identity to Charlotte after Charlotte attempts suicide, and Victoria convinces David that Emily is a threat that must be eliminated.
episodes.title: Disclosure

episodes.synopsis: Jack saves Emily from the fire in the bar. Meanwhile, David breaks into Grayson Manor, and Louise reaches out to Victoria.
episodes.title: Ashes

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of the break-in, an arrest brings David's true identity to light, revealing to Emily that her father is still alive.
episodes.title: Meteor

episodes.synopsis: When Victoria prevents David from learning the truth, Emily schemes to separate the two. Meanwhile, a mysterious assailant attacks David.
episodes.title: Repercussions

episodes.synopsis: Emily uncovers more of David's lies and tells Charlotte the ugly truth about Victoria, and Louise uses Margaux to move steadily closer to Daniel.
episodes.title: Damage

episodes.synopsis: David searches for information about his daughter, but Victoria keeps him in the dark. Meanwhile, Emily suspects her father killed Conrad.
episodes.title: Ambush

episodes.synopsis: Finally meeting with Emily face to face, David reveals how he escaped from jail. But he's soon attacked by a mysterious new assailant.
episodes.title: Contact

episodes.synopsis: Emily suspects a dirty cop is working against her father, and Victoria reveals Emily's true identity to one of Malcolm Black's agents.
episodes.title: Intel

episodes.synopsis: Nolan helps Emily uncover the truth about Kate. When Emily takes matters into her own hands, Jack comes to her rescue with tragic consequences.
episodes.title: Atonement

episodes.synopsis: To avoid problems with Malcolm Black, Emily, David and Jack persuade Victoria to help cover up Kate's death. Meanwhile, David plots his own revenge.
episodes.title: Epitaph

episodes.synopsis: David reveals his plan to kill Malcolm Black. But,  Black strikes first by kidnapping Emily and Victoria.
episodes.title: Madness

episodes.synopsis: David, Ben and Jack work together to free Emily and kill Malcolm Black. Meanwhile, Margaux begins her own crusade for vengeance against Emily.
episodes.title: Abduction

episodes.synopsis: Emily helps Louise confront Penelope about her father's death, Victoria spars with a new high-society rival, and Jack quits his job with the police.
episodes.title: Kindred

episodes.synopsis: While Victoria uses Lyman to get her hands on an inheritance, Emily and Jack enlist Nolan and Louise to thwart Margaux's play for retaliation.
episodes.title: Bait

episodes.synopsis: Margaux resorts to blackmail and bribes to double down on her campaign of vengeance, and Victoria schemes against Natalie to claim the inheritance.
episodes.title: Retaliation

episodes.synopsis: After Emily turns the tables on Margaux's plot to get Jack busted for drunk driving, Margaux frames her for a tragic car accident.
episodes.title: Loss

episodes.synopsis: Margaux blackmails the contract killer she hired to take out Emily, and Emily decides to help clear Jack's name and publicly reveal her true identity.
episodes.title: Clarity

episodes.synopsis: Emily abandons her false persona and embraces her true identity as Amanda, but not everyone is willing to let bygones be bygones.
episodes.title: Exposure

episodes.synopsis: Amanda tries to get on with her life, but Margaux incites Victoria to keep up her vendetta. Meanwhile, David shares sobering news about his health.
episodes.title: Burn

episodes.synopsis: Louise pushes the police to investigate Victoria's apparent suicide, and a frame-up results in Amanda's arrest just as she learns of David's illness.
episodes.title: Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: Now under house arrest, Amanda tries to clear her name. Meanwhile, Ben discovers Victoria alive and makes an effort to expose her.
episodes.title: Plea

episodes.synopsis: Amanda and Victoria confront each other in a final showdown. But can Amanda conclude her quest for revenge and make peace with her life?
episodes.title: Two Graves
